title: If You Claim to Be a Christian
description: Find out exactly what your purpose is, get right with God, increase your blessings tenfold and reserve your one way ticket to Heaven! Learn the twenty two letters of the ancient Hebrew alphabet, decipher their hidden meaning, and find the secret path that God left for you before creation. Each letter contains a hidden mystical instruction, and acts as a guide back to our glorious maker. Have you ever felt like there was more to it? Then this is exactly what you've been looking for! Your life will never be the same!
author: Alexandru Horatiu Mesesan
